title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the constitutional step that would have occurred before Condoleezza Rice was considered by the Senate and explain why the Constitution requires Senate confirmation.

For Task A2, the response must explain why the Constitution requires Senate confirmation.

For Task B, the response must explain how the Senate confirmation process influenced the presidentâ€™s choice of Condoleezza Rice.

For Task C1, the response must describe how the qualifications of Condoleezza Rice mentioned in the scenario match the role for which she has been nominated.

For Task C2, the response must explain how she could influence the executive branch in her role.
